name: Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 Spell Cards you control to the GY. Unaffected by Trap effects, and is only affected by the effects of Spell Cards during the turn they are applied. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. While this card is in face-up Defense Position, monsters your opponent controls cannot target monsters for attacks, except this one. If this Defense Position card is destroyed: You take no damage for the rest of this turn.
